content.question: The work shown demonstrates the influence of Japanese ukiyo-e prints through its depiction of

choices.label: an allegory of vanity heightened by strident colors
daily life using flattened shapes and patterns
a satire of aristocratic life presented with minute detail
a genre scene using objects with symbolic meaning

content.answer: daily life using flattened shapes and patterns

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
